task.title: Export Time for Payroll - CSV
task.shortdesc: Two steps are required in Workforce Management to export time for payroll: timesheet validation and payroll export.

step.cmd: To validate a timesheet, select Team Timesheets from the navigation pane.

substep.cmd: Select the pay group from the drop-down list.
Select the pay period date range in the top right corner.
Select the employees from the list.
Select Approve. Timesheets containing exceptions can still be approved, but timesheet errors must be corrected before approval.

step.info: Time information can be verified before being exported to payroll. The information is based on pay groups or a subset of filtered pay groups for export. The export is by either a range of dates or by pay period duration. When time is exported, the pay groups can be filtered by labor metrics prior to locking or exporting. Only the filtered data is exported.

step.cmd: To export payroll, select Payroll Export from the navigation pane.

substep.cmd: On the Payroll Export page, check the pay group code to be exported.
Select the pay period duration from the drop-down list. This field defaults to the most recent pay period.

step.cmd: Select the Results tab to view the export progress.

Select Refresh to update the progress. The exact number of exportable records appears; if records are still posting to payroll, a status appears. When complete, a link to download the file is available. The CSV file can be downloaded multiple times if needed.
